meanings.definition: The quality or state of being suitable or fit for driving.
meanings.sent1: The driveability of the car was excellent, making it easy to drive long distances.
meanings.sent2: The driveability of the vehicle was a key factor in choosing it for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The driveability of the old truck was so poor that it felt like riding a bumpy rollercoaster.
meanings.sent4: Her smooth driveability on the highway was like a dancer gracefully moving across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The driveability of the sports car was so impressive that it left a lasting impression on everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The ease or comfort with which a vehicle can be driven.
meanings.sent1: The driveability of the new car made it a joy to drive around town.
meanings.sent2: Drivers appreciate a vehicle with good driveability for long commutes.
meanings.sent3: The driveability of the tiny car was surprisingly cozy, like driving a comfortable armchair.
meanings.sent4: Her driveability on the winding roads was as smooth as silk, gliding effortlessly through each turn.
meanings.sent5: The driveability of the electric car was so quiet and smooth that it felt like floating on a cloud.

meanings.definition: The ability of a vehicle to perform well and smoothly while being driven.
meanings.sent1: The driveability of the truck impressed everyone with its power and smooth handling.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic checked the driveability of the car to ensure it was in top condition.
meanings.sent3: The driveability of the vintage car was like a well-oiled machine, purring along the road.
meanings.sent4: Her driveability in the race was unmatched, leaving her competitors in the dust.
meanings.sent5: The driveability of the off-road vehicle was so reliable that it conquered every rough terrain with ease.
